thread.section_title: Hotel Monge - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Service with a smile.
thread.title_full: Service with a smile. - Review of Hotel Monge, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Rossi14
title: Service with a smile.
text:
We stayed at Hotel Monge this weekend for 4 nights. The Staff are so relaxed and friendly and they made us feel so welcome. A very well appointed little hotel in a great location near to 3 Metro stations.
The busy road could not be heard behind the sound windows.
Spotlessly clean and well maintained.
Fantastic breakfast maintained fresh throughout the most generous times of 7 til 11 am.
Great service throughout and we wouldn't hesitate to return.
Merci Merci Merci!
